thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Amanda Salisbury
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Amanda Salisbury

author: Amanda Salisbury
title: Amanda Salisbury
text: We purchased the JR Pass for 7 days. It was straightforward to order and I received it the following day. In Japan it was very easy to redeem and very handy and cost effective to use. It was worth the money spent and I will use it again when we return to Japan.
